catalog_info.title: Romance Translation: Theory and Practice
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: An intermediate to advanced knowledge of at least one Romance language.
catalog_info.description: Translating for art's sake, or to form a national literature? Better yet, to foster ideological debate. And what about all those bad translations? Do you even need to know the original language? Come explore the theory and practice of translation in and from the Romance languages. Includes workshops on a variety of styles, literary devices, pragmatics, semantic and cultural distinctions.
